duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality, cost-effective inpatient/outpatient care for patients with mental health and/or substance abuse issues.
Assure access, conduct assessments, and coordinate clinical summary treatment plans to determine the appropriate level of care.
Assume a caseload and provide mental health and/or substance abuse counseling services to patients.

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree in Social Work, Counseling, Psychology, or related field. Valid CT Licensed Masters of Social Work if Master's degree is in Social Work.
